name: Factory Setting
description:
EDIT: Quick update should fix big tutorial screen (HTML)

You find an old abandoned warehouse and go to snoop around, after a little while you get knocked unconscious from what you belive to be a large piece of rubble, but somehow wake up in a room with a wierd glowy stick with a button on it, turns out its a time machine, and you're also stuck, so you must use it to exit the factory

Honestly if i where to re-do this i would make it top down, i just think it could've worked better as a top down game.
